5010.name: Unknown
5010.message:
You cannot post to Miiverse
from this console.

For details, please start Miiverse.
5010.short_description: Your console has been restricted from posting on Juxtaposition.
5010.long_description:
Your console has been restricted from posting on Juxtaposition.

This typically occurs because of a violation of the Code of Conduct, or other offenses on the Network or the Discord server.
5010.short_solution: Don't do whatever you did to get restricted.
5010.long_solution: For more information, launch the Miiverse app, or request to speak to a moderator in the [Discord server](https://discord.gg/pretendo).
